events.message: I received my order yesterday but I want to return it and get a full refund because the product didn't match the description.
The customer's issue was identified and categorized under the Refund cluster due to their request for returning the item and getting their money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and process the return for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you'd like to return your order and get a refund. I'm here to help you through the process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the reason for the return so we can proceed with your refund request?
The order number is 123456789. I want to return it because the product’s color is completely different from what was shown, and it’s unusable.
Thank you for the info. We will arrange a free return shipping label for you and issue a full refund once we receive the item back. I'll email you the return instructions shortly.
That sounds good, thanks for the quick response and help with this return process.
We have sent you the return label email. Once you send back the product, we will process your refund immediately.
Just checking in to confirm you received the return label email and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
The refund has been successfully processed and the case is now closed. Please feel free to reach out anytime if you need further help.
